definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: Thirty-odd years ago, in 1968, some of the stories collected here first appeared in book form.
sentences.chinese: 本书所收故事，一部分早在一九六八年就出了单行本。

sentences.english: It differs from reprinted publication in that a reprint cites sources.
sentences.chinese: 与单行本出版物的不同之处在于再版引用出处。

sentences.english: This series of monographs in the constantly updated.
sentences.chinese: 本丛书的单行本在不断更新。

definition: serialized/published as a serial (in a newspaper)
the amount of books etc printed at one impression/print run
